coverLetter: My name is Hannah and I am a 19 year old college sophomore with extensive marijuana knowledge and a solid background in the dispensary industry. I have worked at 5 different dispensaries and helped a family member in Washington state open one up with a grow house. I am familiar with many products such as flower, concentrates, tinctures, topicals, edibles, and gear etc as well as many different brands in the industry. I have been promoted at every job I have worked and believe I could be an essential member to your team.
